txt.en:
Bounty: Bel Inzûl Proto-crab

A massive and ancient crab makes a small shipwreck its den. Its presence stifles harvest of the crab meat there.

Slaughter the menace and return to Bel Inzûl's healer for reward.

Do not go alone.
Speak with the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl
You defeated the menace on the northern shore. Return to the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl to claim your reward.
You accepted a bounty for defeating the proto-crab that nest in a wreck in the northern section of the island.

'With the crab removed, we can harvest freely. Take this reward. We recognize the effort it took to defeat this foe.\n\n'We thank you, friend. Killing the creature makes our efforts on the island much safer.'
You defeated the Bel Inzûl proto-crab
Gather a fellowship and make your way to the western side of Bel Inzûl. Defeat the Bel Inzûl proto-crab.
